text: @DavidBrodyCBN @realDonaldTrump Do you know how stupid it is to draw any size of crowd to an indoor rally during a pandemic and not require distancing or masks just so Trump can get a rally boner to make himself feel better? He thinks so little of his base that he doesn't give two shits if they get covid-19
